sentences: Smith grew up in Jefferson, Georgia, near Athens.
He took a job teaching at  North Gwinnett High School in Suwanee, Georgia and taught geography, history, and guitar before deciding to pursue music full-time at the age of 28.
From his first album Undertones in 2003, Smith self-produced nine albums through independent labels.
In 2015 he released his tenth album, While the Getting' Is Good, produced by Keith Stegall on Sugar Hill Records
